title: China says India & Pakistan should hold talks; conduct 'thorough' probe into accidental missile firing - Economic Times
content:
1. China says India & Pakistan should hold talks; conduct 'thorough' probe into accidental missile firing  Economic Times
  2. 'Could've responded': Imran Khan hails military for observing restraint after Indian missile hit Pak  Hindustan Times
  3. With India's Image at Stake, New Delhi Must Answer Tough Questions on 'Rogue' Missile  The Wire
  4. 'Pakistan Observed Restraint:' Dramatic Pak PM Imran Khan On India's Accidental Missile | World News  TIMES NOW
  5. India, Pakistan should hold talks on missile misfire: China  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Zhao Lijian, during a media briefing here, said both Pakistan and India are important countries in South Asia and they share the responsibility to uphold regional security and stability.
